channel.title: The Apollos Project Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest The Apollos Project news and events.

item.title: Release Notes: v1.6
item.description: Today, we’re announcing our next general release, Apollos 1.6. Featured in this release is a new and improved schema for many of our foundational data types, as well as lots of bug fixes and some cool new features.

item.title: Updating from 1.4.3 to 1.5.0
item.description:
Override names have been added (or changed) to all instances of styled and withTheme. This will require updating.

How are they named?

  • The namming convention is package-name.File/ComponentName.StyledComponentName.
  • For example, H1 has been changed to ...

item.title: Release Notes: v1.5
item.description: Today, we’re announcing our next general release, Apollos 1.5. Apollos 1.5 is part 1 in a 2-part release journey focused on reliability and our investment in developer flexibility.
